###POLIT AI###

## Игровые правила ##

#AI_FACTION_LOWER

rule_option_ai_faction_lower_GER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GER has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_LOWER } } enable_reverse = { GER = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_LOWER } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -75 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_lower_ENG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ENG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_LOWER } } enable_reverse = { ENG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_LOWER } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENG } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ENG" value = -75 } }

#AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GER has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GER = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GER target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GER target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ENG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ENG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ENG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ENG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ENG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ENG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ENG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ENG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_POL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = POL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { POL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = POL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } POL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "POL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "POL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = POL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = POL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_AUS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = AUS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { AUS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = AUS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } AUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "AUS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "AUS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = AUS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = AUS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TUR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TUR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TUR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TUR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TUR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TUR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TUR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TUR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GRE = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GRE has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GRE = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GRE } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GRE" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GRE" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GRE target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GRE target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ALB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ALB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ALB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ALB } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ALB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ALB" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ALB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ALB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ALB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_NOR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = NOR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { NOR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NOR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } NOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "NOR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "NOR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = NOR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = NOR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_DEN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = DEN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { DEN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = DEN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } DEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "DEN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "DEN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = DEN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = DEN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BHU = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BHU has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BHU = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BHU } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BHU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BHU" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BHU" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BHU target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BHU target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BRA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BRA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BRA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BRA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BRA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BRA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BRA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BRA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_CAN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CAN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { CAN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CAN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } CAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CAN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CAN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CAN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CAN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_CHI = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CHI has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { CHI = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CHI } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } CHI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CHI" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CHI" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CHI target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CHI target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_IRQ = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = IRQ has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { IRQ = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = IRQ } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } IRQ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "IRQ" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "IRQ" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = IRQ target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = IRQ target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_JAP = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = JAP has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { JAP = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = JAP } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } JAP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JAP" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JAP" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = JAP target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = JAP target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_KOR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KOR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { KOR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KOR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } KOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "KOR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KOR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KOR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KOR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_LIB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = LIB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { LIB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = LIB } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } LIB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "LIB" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "LIB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = LIB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = LIB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MEX = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MEX has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MEX = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MEX } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MEX = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MEX" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MEX" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MEX target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MEX target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SAF = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SAF has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SAF = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SAF } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SAF = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SAF" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SAF" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SAF target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SAF target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SAU = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SAU has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SAU = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SAU } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SAU" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SAU" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SAU target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SAU target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SIA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SIA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SIA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SIA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SIA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SIA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SIA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SIA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SIA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SIK = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SIK has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SIK = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SIK } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SIK" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SIK" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SIK target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SIK target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_DOM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = DOM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { DOM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = DOM } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } DOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "DOM" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "DOM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = DOM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = DOM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_HAI = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = HAI has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { HAI = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = HAI } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } HAI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "HAI" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "HAI" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = HAI target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = HAI target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_YEM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = YEM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { YEM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = YEM } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } YEM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "YEM" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "YEM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = YEM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = YEM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_OMA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = OMA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { OMA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = OMA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } OMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "OMA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "OMA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = OMA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = OMA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SLO = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SLO has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SLO = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SLO } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SLO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SLO" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SLO" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SLO target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SLO target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_JOR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = JOR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { JOR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = JOR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } JOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JOR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JOR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = JOR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = JOR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SYR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SYR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SYR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SYR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SYR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SYR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SYR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SYR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SYR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_EGY = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = EGY has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { EGY = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = EGY } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } EGY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "EGY" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "EGY" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = EGY target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = EGY target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_LBA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = LBA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { LBA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = LBA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } LBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "LBA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "LBA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = LBA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = LBA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_WGR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = WGR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { WGR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = WGR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } WGR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "WGR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "WGR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = WGR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = WGR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MNT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MNT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MNT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MNT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MNT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MNT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MNT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MNT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_UKR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = UKR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { UKR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = UKR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } UKR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "UKR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "UKR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = UKR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = UKR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GEO = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GEO has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GEO = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GEO } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GEO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GEO" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GEO" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GEO target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GEO target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_KAZ = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KAZ has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { KAZ = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KAZ } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } KAZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "KAZ" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KAZ" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KAZ target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KAZ target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_AZR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = AZR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { AZR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = AZR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } AZR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "AZR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "AZR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = AZR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = AZR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BOT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BOT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BOT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BOT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BOT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BOT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BOT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BOT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BOT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MAN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MAN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MAN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MAN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MAN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MAN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MAN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MAN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BAH = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BAH has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BAH = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BAH } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BAH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BAH" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BAH" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BAH target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BAH target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BAN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BAN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BAN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BAN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BAN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BAN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BAN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BAN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BAN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BLZ = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BLZ has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BLZ = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BLZ } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BLZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BLZ" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BLZ" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BLZ target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BLZ target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_PNG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PNG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { PNG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PNG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } PNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "PNG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PNG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PNG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PNG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_PUE = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PUE has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { PUE = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PUE } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } PUE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "PUE" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PUE" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PUE target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PUE target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_QAT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = QAT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { QAT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = QAT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } QAT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "QAT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "QAT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = QAT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = QAT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SCO = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SCO has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SCO = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SCO } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SCO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SCO" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SCO" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SCO target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SCO target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SRL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SRL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SRL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SRL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SRL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SRL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SRL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SRL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SRL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
