rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ALG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ALG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ALG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ALG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ALG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ALG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ALG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ALG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ALG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MOR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MOR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MOR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MOR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MOR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MOR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MOR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MOR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MOR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TUN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TUN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TUN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TUN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TUN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TUN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TUN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TUN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TUN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SUD = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SUD has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SUD = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SUD } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SUD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SUD" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SUD" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SUD target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SUD target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ERI = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ERI has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ERI = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ERI } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ERI = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ERI" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ERI" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ERI target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ERI target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GAB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GAB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GAB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GAB } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GAB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GAB" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GAB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GAB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GAB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_RCG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = RCG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { RCG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RCG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } RCG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "RCG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "RCG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = RCG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = RCG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_EQG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = EQG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { EQG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = EQG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } EQG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "EQG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "EQG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = EQG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = EQG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_CMR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CMR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { CMR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CMR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } CMR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CMR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CMR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CMR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CMR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_CAR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CAR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { CAR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CAR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } CAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CAR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CAR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CAR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CAR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SIE = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SIE has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SIE = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SIE } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SIE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SIE" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SIE" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SIE target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SIE target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GNA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GNA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GNA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GNA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GNA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GNA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GNA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GNA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GNA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GNB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GNB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GNB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GNB } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GNB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GNB" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GNB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GNB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GNB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SEN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SEN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SEN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SEN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SEN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SEN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SEN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SEN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SEN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GAM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GAM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GAM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GAM } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GAM" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GAM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GAM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GAM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MLD = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MLD has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MLD = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MLD } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MLD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MLD" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MLD" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MLD target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MLD target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_FIJ = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = FIJ has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { FIJ = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FIJ } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } FIJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "FIJ" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "FIJ" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = FIJ target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = FIJ target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SLV = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SLV has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SLV = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SLV } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SLV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SLV" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SLV" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SLV target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SLV target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BOS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BOS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BOS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BOS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BOS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BOS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BOS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BOS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BOS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MAC = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MAC has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MAC = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MAC } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MAC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MAC" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MAC" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MAC target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MAC target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BAV = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BAV has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BAV = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BAV } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BAV = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BAV" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BAV" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BAV target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BAV target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_PRS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PRS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { PRS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PRS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } PRS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "PRS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PRS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PRS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PRS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_VUR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = VUR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { VUR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = VUR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } VUR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "VUR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "VUR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = VUR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = VUR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_HNN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = HNN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { HNN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = HNN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } HNN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "HNN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "HNN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = HNN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = HNN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SDT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SDT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SDT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SDT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SDT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SDT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SDT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SDT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SDT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_NCP = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = NCP has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { NCP = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NCP } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } NCP = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "NCP" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "NCP" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = NCP target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = NCP target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MLT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MLT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MLT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MLT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MLT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MLT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MLT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MLT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MLT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_DNZ = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = DNZ has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { DNZ = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = DNZ } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } DNZ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "DNZ" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "DNZ" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = DNZ target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = DNZ target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_RUS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = RUS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { RUS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RUS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } RUS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "RUS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "RUS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = RUS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = RUS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MNC = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MNC has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MNC = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MNC } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MNC" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MNC" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MNC target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MNC target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SMA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SMA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SMA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SMA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SMA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SMA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SMA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SMA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TRT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TRT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TRT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TRT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TRT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TRT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TRT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TRT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TRT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GRO = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GRO has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GRO = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GRO } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GRO = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GRO" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GRO" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GRO target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GRO target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BRY = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BRY has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BRY = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BRY } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BRY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BRY" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BRY" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BRY target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BRY target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_LKA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = LKA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { LKA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = LKA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } LKA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "LKA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "LKA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = LKA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = LKA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_KZN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KZN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { KZN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KZN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } KZN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "KZN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KZN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KZN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KZN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_KAR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KAR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { KAR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KAR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } KAR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "KAR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KAR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KAR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KAR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TRA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TRA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TRA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TRA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TRA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TRA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TRA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TRA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TRA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_PVG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PVG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { PVG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PVG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } PVG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "PVG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PVG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PVG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PVG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_RIU = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = RIU has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { RIU = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RIU } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } RIU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "RIU" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "RIU" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = RIU target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = RIU target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_JUL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = JUL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { JUL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = JUL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } JUL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JUL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JUL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = JUL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = JUL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_PAU = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PAU has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { PAU = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PAU } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } PAU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "PAU" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PAU" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PAU target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PAU target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SIH = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SIH has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SIH = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SIH } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SIH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SIH" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SIH" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SIH target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SIH target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_XIK = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = XIK has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { XIK = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = XIK } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } XIK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "XIK" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "XIK" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = XIK target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = XIK target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TNG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TNG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TNG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TNG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TNG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TNG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TNG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TNG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TNG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BAS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BAS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BAS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BAS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BAS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BAS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BAS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BAS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GLC = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GLC has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { GLC = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GLC } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GLC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GLC" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GLC" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GLC target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GLC target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SNT = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SNT has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SNT = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SNT } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SNT = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SNT" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SNT" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SNT target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SNT target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ASU = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ASU has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ASU = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ASU } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ASU = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ASU" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ASU" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ASU target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ASU target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_CAS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CAS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { CAS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CAS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } CAS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CAS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CAS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CAS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CAS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
