rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_HEL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = HEL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { HEL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = HEL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } HEL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "HEL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "HEL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = HEL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = HEL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_EMA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = EMA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { EMA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = EMA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } EMA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "EMA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "EMA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = EMA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = EMA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SRD = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SRD has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SRD = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SRD } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SRD = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SRD" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SRD" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SRD target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SRD target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SIC = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SIC has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SIC = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SIC } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SIC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SIC" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SIC" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SIC target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SIC target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_VNC = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = VNC has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { VNC = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = VNC } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } VNC = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "VNC" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "VNC" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = VNC target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = VNC target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TIR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TIR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TIR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TIR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TIR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TIR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TIR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TIR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TIR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ADY = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ADY has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ADY = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ADY } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ADY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ADY" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ADY" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ADY target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ADY target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_KCH = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KCH has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { KCH = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KCH } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } KCH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "KCH" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KCH" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KCH target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KCH target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_KBA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KBA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { KBA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KBA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } KBA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "KBA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KBA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KBA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KBA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_OAL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = OAL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { OAL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = OAL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } OAL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "OAL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "OAL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = OAL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = OAL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ICH = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ICH has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ICH = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ICH } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ICH = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ICH" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ICH" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ICH target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ICH target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_DAG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = DAG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { DAG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = DAG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } DAG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "DAG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "DAG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = DAG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = DAG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_WLN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = WLN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { WLN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = WLN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } WLN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "WLN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "WLN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = WLN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = WLN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_FLA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = FLA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { FLA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FLA } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } FLA = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "FLA" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "FLA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = FLA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = FLA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BDN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BDN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BDN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BDN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BDN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BDN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BDN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BDN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BDN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MKB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MKB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MKB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MKB } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MKB = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MKB" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MKB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MKB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MKB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TKN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TKN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TKN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TKN } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TKN = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TKN" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TKN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TKN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TKN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BHR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BHR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BHR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BHR } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BHR = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BHR" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BHR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BHR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BHR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ALW = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ALW has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ALW = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ALW } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ALW = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ALW" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ALW" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ALW target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ALW target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_JDS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = JDS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { JDS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = JDS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } JDS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "JDS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "JDS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = JDS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = JDS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_IOM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = IOM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { IOM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = IOM } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } IOM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "IOM" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "IOM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = IOM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = IOM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_TIG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TIG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { TIG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TIG } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } TIG = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "TIG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TIG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TIG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TIG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SOL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SOL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SOL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SOL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SOL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SOL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SOL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SOL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SOL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_SAM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = SAM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { SAM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = SAM } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } SAM = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "SAM" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "SAM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = SAM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = SAM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BAY = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BAY has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BAY = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BAY } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BAY = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BAY" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BAY" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BAY target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BAY target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_MEK = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MEK has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { MEK = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MEK } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } MEK = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "MEK" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MEK" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MEK target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MEK target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_PRE = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PRE has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { PRE = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PRE } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } PRE = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "PRE" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PRE" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PRE target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PRE target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_NFL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = NFL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { NFL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NFL } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } NFL = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "NFL" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "NFL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = NFL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = NFL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_CER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CER has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { CER = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CER } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } CER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "CER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CER" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CER target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CER target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_ROJ = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ROJ has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { ROJ = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROJ } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } ROJ = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ROJ" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ROJ" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ROJ target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ROJ target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_BTS = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BTS has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { BTS = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BTS } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } BTS = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "BTS" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BTS" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BTS target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BTS target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D06 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D06 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D06 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D06 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D06 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D06" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D06" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D06 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D06 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D08 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D08 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D08 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D08 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D08 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D08" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D08" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D08 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D08 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D09 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D09 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D09 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D09 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D09 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D09" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D09" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D09 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D09 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D19 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D19 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D19 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D19 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D19 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D19" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D19" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D19 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D19 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D21 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D21 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D21 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D21 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D21 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D21" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D21" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D21 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D21 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D22 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D22 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D22 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D22 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D22 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D22" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D22" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D22 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D22 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D32 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D32 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D32 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D32 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D32 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D32" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D32" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D32 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D32 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D34 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D34 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D34 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D34 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D34 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D34" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D34" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D34 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D34 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_D35 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D35 has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } } enable_reverse = { D35 = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D35 } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } D35 = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D35" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "D35" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = D35 target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = D35 target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

#AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_hard_GER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GER has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD } } enable_reverse = { GER = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER has_government = GER } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GER target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GER target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_hard_ENG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ENG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD } } enable_reverse = { ENG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENG has_government = ENG } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ENG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ENG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ENG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

#AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_GER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GER has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { GER = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } GER = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } GER = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } GER = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } GER = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } GER = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GER target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GER target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_ENG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ENG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { ENG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENG } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } ENG = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } ENG = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } ENG = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } ENG = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } ENG = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ENG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ENG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ENG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_HOL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = HOL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { HOL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = HOL } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } HOL = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } HOL = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } HOL = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } HOL = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } HOL = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "HOL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = HOL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = HOL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_NOR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = NOR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { NOR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NOR } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } NOR = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } NOR = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } NOR = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } NOR = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } NOR = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "NOR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = NOR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = NOR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_COL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = COL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { COL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = COL } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } COL = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } COL = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } COL = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } COL = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } COL = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "COL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = COL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = COL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_PAN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = PAN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { PAN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = PAN } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } PAN = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } PAN = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } PAN = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } PAN = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } PAN = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "PAN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = PAN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = PAN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_CUB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = CUB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { CUB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = CUB } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } CUB = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } CUB = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } CUB = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } CUB = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } CUB = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "CUB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = CUB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = CUB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_EGY = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = EGY has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { EGY = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = EGY } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } EGY = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } EGY = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } EGY = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } EGY = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } EGY = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "EGY" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = EGY target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = EGY target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_ARM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = ARM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { ARM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ARM } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } ARM = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } ARM = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } ARM = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } ARM = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } ARM = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ARM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = ARM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = ARM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_GYA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GYA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { GYA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GYA } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } GYA = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } GYA = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } GYA = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } GYA = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } GYA = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GYA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GYA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GYA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_KYR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KYR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { KYR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KYR } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } KYR = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } KYR = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } KYR = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } KYR = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } KYR = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KYR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KYR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KYR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }
