rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_KUW = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = KUW has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { KUW = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = KUW } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } KUW = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } KUW = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } KUW = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } KUW = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } KUW = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "KUW" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = KUW target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = KUW target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_RCG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = RCG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { RCG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RCG } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } RCG = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } RCG = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } RCG = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } RCG = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } RCG = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "RCG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = RCG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = RCG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_GAM = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GAM has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { GAM = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GAM } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } GAM = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } GAM = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } GAM = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } GAM = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } GAM = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GAM" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = GAM target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = GAM target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_DVR = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = DVR has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { DVR = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = DVR } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } DVR = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } DVR = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } DVR = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } DVR = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } DVR = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "DVR" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = DVR target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = DVR target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_WAL = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = WAL has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { WAL = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = WAL } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } WAL = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } WAL = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } WAL = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } WAL = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } WAL = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "WAL" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = WAL target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = WAL target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_MNC = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = MNC has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { MNC = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = MNC } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } MNC = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } MNC = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } MNC = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } MNC = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } MNC = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "MNC" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = MNC target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = MNC target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_TRA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TRA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { TRA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TRA } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } TRA = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } TRA = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } TRA = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } TRA = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } TRA = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TRA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TRA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TRA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_BWI = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BWI has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { BWI = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BWI } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } BWI = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } BWI = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } BWI = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } BWI = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } BWI = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BWI" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BWI target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BWI target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_TNG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = TNG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { TNG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = TNG } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } TNG = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } TNG = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } TNG = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } TNG = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } TNG = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "TNG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = TNG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = TNG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_VLA = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = VLA has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { VLA = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = VLA } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } VLA = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } VLA = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } VLA = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } VLA = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } VLA = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "VLA" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = VLA target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = VLA target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_LIG = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = LIG has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { LIG = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = LIG } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } LIG = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } LIG = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } LIG = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } LIG = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } LIG = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "LIG" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = LIG target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = LIG target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_BDN = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = BDN has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { BDN = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = BDN } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } BDN = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } BDN = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } BDN = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } BDN = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } BDN = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "BDN" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = BDN target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = BDN target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_LES = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = LES has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { LES = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = LES } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } LES = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } LES = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } LES = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } LES = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } LES = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "LES" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = LES target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = LES target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_NAV = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = NAV has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { NAV = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = NAV } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } NAV = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } NAV = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } NAV = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } NAV = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } NAV = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "NAV" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = NAV target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = NAV target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_EHB = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = EHB has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } } enable_reverse = { EHB = { is_subject = no OR = { is_faction_leader = yes has_rule = can_create_factions } } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = EHB } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } EHB = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } EHB = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } else_if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } EHB = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } if = { limit = { has_government = fascism } EHB = { NOT = { has_government = technocracy } } } } else_if = { limit = { has_government = technocracy } EHB = { has_government = monarchy } } else = { always = no } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "EHB" value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_desire id = EHB target = join_faction value = -6000 } ai_strategy = { type = diplo_action_acceptance id = EHB target = offer_join_faction value = -6000 } }

#AI_AGGRESSION_MORE

ai_aggression_more_status_GER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GER OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_MORE } has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG has_global_flag = THE_MOTHER_OF_ORDER_FLAG } } enable_reverse = { GER = { is_subject = no num_divisions > 0 } } enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_MORE } has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_MORE_FLAG NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } is_neighbor_of = GER } target_array = GER.neighbors abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = conquer id = "GER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = declare_war id = "GER" value = 75 }	ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "GER" value = 75 } }

#AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA

ai_aggression_ultra_status_GER = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = GER OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA } has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG has_global_flag = THE_MOTHER_OF_ORDER_FLAG } } enable_reverse = { GER = { is_subject = no num_divisions > 0 } } enable = { if = { limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG } } OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA } has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_FLAG } } else = { OR = { has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_FLAG has_country_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_CHOOSEN_ONE_FLAG } } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } is_neighbor_of = GER GER = { num_divisions > 0 } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = conquer id = "GER" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = declare_war id = "GER" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "GER" value = 5000 } }

ai_aggression_ultra_status_D49 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D49 OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA } has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG has_global_flag = THE_MOTHER_OF_ORDER_FLAG } } enable_reverse = { D49 = { is_subject = no num_divisions > 0 } } enable = { if = { limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG } } OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA } has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_FLAG } } else = { OR = { has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_FLAG has_country_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_CHOOSEN_ONE_FLAG } } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D49 } is_neighbor_of = D49 D49 = { num_divisions > 0 } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D49" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = conquer id = "D49" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = declare_war id = "D49" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "D49" value = 5000 } }
ai_aggression_ultra_status_D50 = { reversed = yes allowed = { tag = D50 OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA } has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG has_global_flag = THE_MOTHER_OF_ORDER_FLAG } } enable_reverse = { D50 = { is_subject = no num_divisions > 0 } } enable = { if = { limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG } } OR = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_aggression_status option = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA } has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_FLAG } } else = { OR = { has_global_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_FLAG has_country_flag = AI_AGGRESSION_ULTRA_CHOOSEN_ONE_FLAG } } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = D50 } is_neighbor_of = D50 D50 = { num_divisions > 0 } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D50" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = conquer id = "D50" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = declare_war id = "D50" value = 5000 } ai_strategy = { type = prepare_for_war id = "D50" value = 5000 } }



#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_25

ai_division_limiter_25 = {
	allowed = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_25 }
	}
	enable = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_25 }
		num_divisions > 25
		is_major = no
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}

#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_50

ai_division_limiter_50 = {
	allowed = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_50 }
	}
	enable = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_50 }
		num_divisions > 50
		is_major = no
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }

		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_150 }
	}
	enable = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_150 }
		num_divisions > 150
		is_major = no
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }

#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_DYNAMIC

ai_division_limiter_dynamic = {
	allowed = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_DYNAMIC }
	}
	enable = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = GER
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						OR = {
							NOT = { has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger" }
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = GER_ai_behavior
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}	
					}
					has_country_flag = GER_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
					has_global_flag = NW_GER_AI_FASCIST
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = GER_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
				}
			}
			date > 1940.1.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = JAP
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_historical_focus_on = yes
						OR = {
							not = { has_dlc = "Waking the Tiger" }
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = JAP_ai_behavior
								option = DEFAULT
							}
						}
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = JAP_ai_behavior
						option = FASCIST
					}
					has_country_flag = JAP_AI_RANDOM_FASCIST
				}
			}
			date > 1940.1.1
		}
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_DYNAMIC }
		check_variable = { num_divisions > ai_upper_limit }
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}

ai_division_limiter_american_full_stop = {
	allowed = {
		OR = {
			original_tag = JAM
			original_tag = COS
			original_tag = PAN
			original_tag = SUR
			original_tag = VEN
			original_tag = COL
			original_tag = ECU
			original_tag = KEC
			original_tag = PAR
			original_tag = PRU
			original_tag = PAU
			original_tag = JUL
			original_tag = PAT
			original_tag = RIU
			original_tag = URG
			original_tag = CHL
			original_tag = ARG
			original_tag = NIC
			original_tag = HON
			original_tag = ELS
			original_tag = GUA
			original_tag = CUB
			original_tag = HAI
			original_tag = BWI
		}
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = THE_MOTHER_OF_ORDER_FLAG
			has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG
		}
	}
	enable = {
		threat < 1
		has_war = no
		any_of_scopes = {
			array = global.country_in_south_america
			NOT = {
				tag = USA
				tag = CSA
				tag = USB
			}
			has_war = no
		}
		NOT = {
			any_of_scopes = {
				array = ROOT.potential_and_current_enemies
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		all_of_scopes = {
			array = global.country_in_south_america
			is_ai = no
		}
		any_of_scopes = {
			array = global.start_americans
			OR = {
				exists = no
				is_subject = yes
			}
		}
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}

ai_division_limiter_american_partical_stop = {
	allowed = {
		OR = {
			original_tag = JAM
			original_tag = COS
			original_tag = PAN
			original_tag = SUR
			original_tag = VEN
			original_tag = COL
			original_tag = ECU
			original_tag = KEC
			original_tag = PAR
			original_tag = PRU
			original_tag = PAU
			original_tag = JUL
			original_tag = PAT
			original_tag = RIU
			original_tag = URG
			original_tag = CHL
			original_tag = ARG
			original_tag = NIC
			original_tag = HON
			original_tag = ELS
			original_tag = GUA
			original_tag = CUB
			original_tag = HAI
			original_tag = BWI
		}
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = THE_MOTHER_OF_ORDER_FLAG
			has_global_flag = WORLD_OF_SPLIT_FLAG
		}
	}
	enable = {
		threat > 0.99
		has_war = no
		any_of_scopes = {
			array = global.country_in_south_america
			NOT = {
				tag = USA
				tag = CSA
				tag = USB
			}
			has_war = no
		}
		NOT = {
			any_of_scopes = {
				array = ROOT.potential_and_current_enemies
				exists = yes
			}
		}
		all_of_scopes = {
			array = global.country_in_south_america
			is_ai = no
		}
		any_of_scopes = {
			array = global.start_americans
			OR = {
				exists = no
				is_subject = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = ARG
					original_tag = CHL
				}
			}
			num_divisions > 17
		}
		else = { num_divisions > 10 }
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}




#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_TOTAL

ai_division_limiter_total = {
	allowed = {
		NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_total_limiter_status option = DEFAULT } }
	}
	enable = {
		NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_total_limiter_status option = DEFAULT } }
		check_variable = { global.total_division > global.total_division_limit }
		num_divisions > 0
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}



#AI_FORCE_BUILD_ARMIES_STATUS

ai_force_build_armies_up = {
	allowed = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_force_build_armies_status option = AI_FORCE_BUILD_ARMIES_UP }
	}
	enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_force_build_armies_status option = AI_FORCE_BUILD_ARMIES_UP } has_manpower > 0 }
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes
	ai_strategy = { type = force_build_armies value = 1000 }
}
